rows.label: tlk70000123_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Question for you Drivers!
Do you understand your skills?

rows.label: tlk70000123_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Each Driver have different focus,
right? So skills to remember are
different for each person.

rows.label: tlk70000123_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Good thing is, once skill is learnt,
it never gets forgotten! No need for
dizzy Dolala to worry about forgetting!
